messages.title: Working for you in the Cities of London & Westminster
messages.content: Vote for what you believe in.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Good housing should be a right, not a privilege. I will push for more affordable, community housing.
I will work to restore police facilities and community support to help them fight crime.
I will always fight to maintain frontline jobs and services in the NHS.
I will support the Tory plans to close vital Sure Start centres.
I will help starter tax rate, which will help those most in need.

issues.health: I will always fight to maintain frontline jobs and services in the NHS.

housing.content: Good housing should be a right, not a privilege. I will push for more affordable, community housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: My background makes me a different kind of candidate, and I'll be a different kind of MP.

endorsements.endorsement: David is a local resident. He's voting for David Rowntree because David is 'my type: real, down-to-earth, understands that for young families these are difficult times'. He respects David's attention to detail and his 'hands-on experience' will make a real difference in the House of Commons. 'There's no doubt in my mind on May 6th, David Rowntree deserves your support.'

images.caption: David Rowntree at various community events

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote for what you believe in.
